QuestData.Title: The Unstable Prism
QuestData.Description: As the prism struggles to stabilize in a single time flow, it bleeds a shadowy chill, the likes of which you haven't felt since Northrend. Surely some mage in Dalaran would be interested in this relic.
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver the Frigid Timewarped Prism to an interested mage in Dalaran.
